title: Brazil Federal Tax Revenues
description: Government Revenues in Brazil decreased to 166287 BRL Million in September from 172314 BRL Million in August of 2022. Government Revenues in Brazil averaged 74117.02 BRL Million from 1998 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 235321.29 BRL Million in January of 2022 and a record low of 12715.40 BRL Million in November of 1998. Government Revenues refer to all receipts the government gets, including taxes, custom duties, revenue from state-owned enterprises, capital revenues and foreign aid. Government Revenues are part of government budget balance calculation. This page provides - Brazil Government Revenues- actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Ministério da Fazenda, Brazil
